page.title: 07Warsop's Oil Depot.
page.content:
A new skyline was given to Warsop when the B.P.Oil Depot was built about 20 years ago.Three huge oil tanks tower over the outskirts of the town. They were built in the disused goods yard at the once busy railway station.
The tanks altogether hold about 1,651,000 litres of refined oil.Just one train brings 750,000 litres from the refinery.
The oil is delivered by road to farms,industry,haulage businesses and private houses.
In the summer about 250 tonnes of oil are delivered whereas in winter this quantity is doubled.
